00027 //
00028 // Define the DMA page register structure.
00029 //
00030 
00031 #define DMA_BANK_A31_A24_DR0   0xe05
00032 #define DMA_BANK_A31_A24_DR1   0xe07
00033 #define DMA_BANK_A31_A24_DR2   0xe09
00034 #define DMA_BANK_A31_A24_DR3   0xe0b
00035 #define DMA_INC_ENABLE_A31_A24 0xe0f
00036 
00037 //
00038 // Define the DMA 2 page register structure.
00039 //
00040 
00041 #define DMA2_BANK_A31_A24_DR5   0xf07
00042 #define DMA2_BANK_A31_A24_DR6   0xf09
00043 #define DMA2_BANK_A31_A24_DR7   0xf0b
00044 #define DMA2_INC_ENABLE_A31_A24 0xf0f
00045 
00046 //
00047 // Define the DMA 2 mode change register
00048 //
00049 #define DMA2_MODE_CHANGE      0xf4
00050 #define DMA2_MODE_8237_COMP   0x0
00051 #define DMA2_MODE_71037_A     0x1
00052 #define DMA2_MODE_71037_B     0x2
00053 #define DMA2_MODE_71037_C     0x3
00054 
00055 #define DMA_STATUS 0xc8
00056 #define DMA_COMMAND 0xc8
00057 #define SINGLE_MASK 0xca
00058 #define MODE 0xcb
00059 #define CLEAR_BYTE_POINTER 0xcc
00060 #define CLEAR_MASK 0xce
00061 
00062 typedef struct _DMA_PAGE{
00063     UCHAR Reserved1;            // offset 0x20
00064     UCHAR Channel1;             // offset 0x21
00065     UCHAR Reserved2;
00066     UCHAR Channel2;             // offset 0x23
00067     UCHAR Reserved3;
00068     UCHAR Channel3;             // offset 0x25
00069     UCHAR Reserved4;
00070     UCHAR Channel0;             // offset 0x27
00071     UCHAR Reserved5[0x120-0x27];// offset 0x120
00072     UCHAR Channel5;             // offset 0x121
00073     UCHAR Reserved6;
00074     UCHAR Channel6;             // offset 0x123
00075     UCHAR Reserved7;
00076     UCHAR Channel7;             // offset 0x125
00077     UCHAR Reserved8[4];
00078 }DMA_PAGE, *PDMA_PAGE;
00079

00083

00085     UCHAR ChannelLsb;
00086     UCHAR ChannelMsb;
00087     UCHAR ChannelHsb;
00088     UCHAR Reserved;
00089 }DMA_CHANNEL_STOP, *PDMA_CHANNEL_STOP;

00114 //
00115 // Define DMA 1 control register structure.
00116 //
00117 
00118 typedef struct _DMA1_CONTROL {
00119     DMA1_ADDRESS_COUNT DmaAddressCount[4];
00120     UCHAR Reserved1;
00121     UCHAR DmaStatus;            //offset 0x11
00122     UCHAR Reserved2;
00123     UCHAR DmaRequest;           //offset 0x13
00124     UCHAR Reserved3;
00125     UCHAR SingleMask;           //offset 0x15
00126     UCHAR Reserved4;
00127     UCHAR Mode;                 //offset 0x17
00128     UCHAR Reserved5;
00129     UCHAR ClearBytePointer;     //offset 0x19
00130     UCHAR Reserved6;
00131     UCHAR MasterClear;          //offset 0x1b
00132     UCHAR Reserved7;
00133     UCHAR ClearMask;            //offset 0x1d
00134     UCHAR Reserved;
00135     UCHAR AllMask;              //offset 0x1f
00136 }DMA1_CONTROL, *PDMA1_CONTROL;

00138 //
00139 // Define DMA 2 control register structure.
00140 //
00141 
00142 typedef struct _DMA2_CONTROL {
00143     UCHAR Reserved8[0x100-0x20];//offset 0x20
00144     DMA2_ADDRESS_COUNT DmaAddressCount[4]; //offset 0x100
00145     UCHAR Reserved1;
00146     UCHAR DmaStatus;            //offset 0x111
00147     UCHAR Reserved2;
00148     UCHAR DmaRequest;           //offset 0x113
00149     UCHAR Reserved3;
00150     UCHAR SingleMask;           //offset 0x115
00151     UCHAR Reserved4;
00152     UCHAR Mode;                 //offset 0x117
00153     UCHAR Reserved5;
00154     UCHAR ClearBytePointer;     //offset 0x119
00155     UCHAR Reserved6;
00156     UCHAR MasterClear;          //offset 0x11b
00157     UCHAR Reserved7;
00158     UCHAR ClearMask;            //offset 0x11d
00159     UCHAR Reserved;
00160     UCHAR AllMask;              //offset 0x11f
00161     UCHAR Reserved9[10];        //offset 0x120
00162 }DMA2_CONTROL, *PDMA2_CONTROL;

00260 //
00261 // Define 82357 register structure.
00262 //
00263 
00264 typedef struct _EISA_CONTROL {
00265     union   {
00266         DMA1_CONTROL Dma1BasePort;          // Offset 0x00
00267         struct  {
00268             UCHAR Interrupt1ControlPort0;   // Offset 0x00
00269             UCHAR Reserved1;
00270             UCHAR Interrupt1ControlPort1;   // Offset 0x02
00271             UCHAR Reserved2[5];
00272             UCHAR Interrupt2ControlPort0;   // Offset 0x08
00273             UCHAR Reserved3;
00274             UCHAR Interrupt2ControlPort1;   // Offset 0x0A
00275             UCHAR Reserved4[sizeof(DMA1_CONTROL)-11];
00276 
00277         };
00278     };
00279     union {
00280         DMA_PAGE DmaPageLowPort;                    // Offset 0x20
00281         DMA2_CONTROL Dma2BasePort;                  // Offset 0x20
00282         struct {
00283             UCHAR Reserved20[9];                    // Offset 0x20
00284             UCHAR PageIncrementMode;                // Offset 0x29
00285             UCHAR Reserved21;
00286             UCHAR InDirectAddress;                  // Offset 0x2b
00287             UCHAR Reserved22;
00288             UCHAR InDirectData;                     // Offset 0x2d
00289             UCHAR Reserved23[0x7f - 0x2e];
00290             UCHAR PageIncrementMode2;               // Offset 0x7f
00291             UCHAR Reserved24[0x129 - 0x80];
00292             UCHAR DMA2PageIncrementMode;            // Offset 0x129
00293         };
00294     };
00295     UCHAR Reserved25[0xfffc - 0x130];               // Offset 0x130
00296     //
00297     // No NEC PC98 have 2nd DMA controller. But PC/AT has one. Therefore there are some valuable
00298     // refer to 2nd DMA in ixisasup.c.
00299     // I add it following valuable so that HAL builds. HAL of NEC PC98 doesn't use it.
00300     //
00301     UCHAR Dma1ExtendedModePort;
00302     UCHAR Dma2ExtendedModePort;
00303     UCHAR DmaPageHighPort;
00304     UCHAR Interrupt1EdgeLevel;
00305     UCHAR Interrupt2EdgeLevel;
00306 
00307 } EISA_CONTROL, *PEISA_CONTROL;
00308

00362 //
00363 
00364 #define VERIFY_TRANSFER     0x00
00365 #define READ_TRANSFER       0x01        // Read from the device.
00366 #define WRITE_TRANSFER      0x02        // Write to the device.

00410 //
00411 // Define constants used by Intel 8237A DMA chip
00412 //
00413 
00414 #define DMA_SETMASK     4
00415 #define DMA_CLEARMASK       0
00416 #define DMA_READ            4  // These two appear backwards, but I think
00417 #define DMA_WRITE           8  // the DMA docs have them mixed up
00418 #define DMA_SINGLE_TRANSFER 0x40
00419 #define DMA_AUTO_INIT       0x10 // Auto initialization mode
00420 #endif

00423 //
00424 // This structure is drive layout and partition information
00425 // for NEC PC-98xx series.
00426 //
00427 
00428 typedef struct _PARTITION_INFORMATION_NEC {
00429     UCHAR PartitionType;
00430     BOOLEAN RecognizedPartition;
00431     BOOLEAN RewritePartition;
00432     ULONG PartitionNumber;
00433     LARGE_INTEGER IplStartOffset;
00434     LARGE_INTEGER StartingOffset;
00435     LARGE_INTEGER PartitionLength;
00436     UCHAR BootableFlag;
00437     UCHAR PartitionName[16];
00438 } PARTITION_INFORMATION_NEC, *PPARTITION_INFORMATION_NEC;
